comment.text: This translation key is used for the title of a payment settings section in a wallet management interface. It will appear as "Amount Selection" and is displayed to the user when navigating through payment category settings.

usage.context:
<Text
 fontWeight="700"
 fontSize="16px"
 className={styles.amountTitleMain}
 >
 {t("AmountSelection")}
 </Text>
 <Tabs
 items={amountTabs()}
 selectedItemId=""
 onSelect={onSelectAmount}
